metadata.dc:author: Delagneau Rivas, J
Mendoza Carcamo, M
González Núñez, F
Martí Mestre, J
Bosch Princep, R
Sánchez Martín, F
metadata.dc:description: Urinary bladder xanthoma (UBX) is an infrequent lesion that has been very rarely referred to in medical literature. We describe a case of UBX that was associated with a low-grade transitional cell carcinoma of the urinary bladder. The cystoscopic aspect of this lesion was so characteristic that diagnosis could be suggested at cystoscopy, while histological examination confirmed this.
metadata.dc:title: Xantoma vesical. Hallazgo cistoscopico.
[Urinary bladder xanthoma. A cystoscopic finding].
